caption: This place is amazing! Their food is so good and reasonably priced. They have many gluten free options too, and it never made me feel sick. The arepas and appetizers are awesome, and the servers are super friendly too. I hope the new location is successful, I have no doubt it will be. Go here!! Rica rica!

I love this place and so glad they opened a location in lakeview! They have an outdoor patio in the back. Great for winters and summers. It is byob.... Super delicious arepas that are filling, tasty and satisfying. I love the garlic and hot sauce they provide for the arepas. The chicken empanada was awesome! I got some yucca fries too! Delicious! I love the morra, parchita and the chicha drinks! I love food from Venezuela! The customer service was great! They just opened 6 weeks ago.

Great addition to the neighborhood. Everything was delicious. As others have said, one arepa each was enough for us-- they're stuffed. Finished with the taquenos with nutella which are pretty perfect -- almost reminiscent of a fried cannoli. Will be back.

We just tried this place this evening and we regret not trying it the day they opened! We got two arepas each and the appetizer sampler. The food is absolutely delicious and very filling. Two arepas each was way too much but it will make for great leftovers! Highly recommend and we will be eating here often. We just did carry out but they said they have a patio out back and it’s dog friendly!

The best have happened in the neighborhood. I’m so happy to have the best Venezuelans Empanadas of Chicago close to my house! If you are new to Venezuelan food, I recommend to try from Rica Arepa the Cheese Empanadas, Arepa Reina Pepiada, Tequeños and the burger.
(Translated by Google) Excellent site, recommended  (Original) Excelente sitio, recomendado
Loved the empanadas and fresh mango water
The food was amazing and the service was great! I love this restaurant and will continue to come! Highly recommend
Great addition to the neighborhood. Delicious food, highly recommend!

Just tried this place for the first time, really great. The arepas are delicious, filling, and satisfying; 1 per person was plenty for us, even though we wanted to try everything. The flan was very light and caramel-y, and the space itself seemed very nice. Big floor to ceiling door/windows on the front. The staff was very nice (we did takeout, so only brief interactions, but everything you could hope for). Got the feeling this will be a neighborhood favorite!
(Translated by Google) Excellent Venezuelan restaurant, without a doubt one of the best in Chicago.  (Original) Excelente restaurante Venezolano, sin duda uno de los mejores en chicago.
As a mexican, I find their "cachapas de "queso de mano" as the next level of quesadillas. I actually visited this place 3 times in a period of two weeks

Wowow! Amazing! Every single thing was delicious. Thanks for opening a Venezuelan spot in the neighborhood. The friendly & fast service were the icing on the cake. Speaking of cake, the tres leches cake was SO good, too.
Great burger and The cachapa

The food is very good I would like to give them 3 stars but I am not for something that can really improve I think that it is not appropriate for customers to enter with beer and feel as if nothing and uncover their alcoholic beverages as if it were a parke that is a  very bad impression of the place I hope one day to return and not look at this inconvenience that gives a very bad appearance of the place!.!.
Absolutely amazing food. Great customer service. Friendly staff. Will definitely be back!!

(Translated by Google) Excellent food accompanied by the best service, how nice it is to feel at home, congratulations guys  (Original) Excelente comida acompañado de la mejor atención, que bonito es sentirse como en casa, felicitaciones chicos

(Translated by Google) Without a doubt I can say that this place is magical, you feel at home, the attention is incredible from its owners to each of the boys, the best place to eat and feel that you are in Venezuela.  Without a doubt I can say that this place is magical, you feel at home, the attention is incredible from its owners to each of the boys, the best place to eat and feel that you are in Venezuela. Sin duda puedo decir que este lugar es mágico, te sientes como en casa, la atención es increíble de sus dueños a cada uno de los chicos, el mejor lugar para comer y sentir que estás en Venezuela.
This place is the heaven! Good food and amazing customer service!! A piece of Venezuela in Chicago!!! Thank you so much guys! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
(Translated by Google) Excellent food, excellent service, the sea and land grill was very tasty !!  (Original) Excelente comida, excelente servicio, la parrilla mar y tierra estaba muy rica!!
